description:
A B-rank adventurer from the nearby settlement of Zoltan, Rit is a long-time associate of Gideon. Upon hearing about Red from the adventurer`s guild, she wonders whether it`s actually Gideon and visits the newly opened pharmacy. She ends up living there and helping out.
Her real identity is Rizlet of Loggervia, the Princess of Loggervia. She had love interest for Gideon for a long time. As progress when liviing with Gideon, she become his partner
Source: Official page
name: Rit
